text: "I'm Still Gonna Need You" is a song performed by The Osmonds in 1975. It is on their 1975 album, The Proud One.The Osmonds, "I'm Still Gonna Need You" information Retrieved June 28, 2015 Its B-side, "Thank You", is also on the album. It reached No. 38 on the U.S. Adult Contemporary chart and No. 32 in the U.K.The Osmonds, "I'm Still Gonna Need You" chart positions Retrieved June 28, 2015 The mid-tempo ballad is sung primarily by Merrill Osmond and the other Osmond brothers filling in the various harmony parts during the chorus. ==Charts== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (1975) !Peak position |- |US Adult Contemporary |align="center"|38 |- |UK Singles Chart |align="center"|32 |} ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:1975 singles Category:The Osmonds songs Category:MGM Records singles
title: I'm Still Gonna Need You
